text: Scott Vincent (born 20 May 1992) is a Zimbabwean professional golfer who plays on the European Tour and the Asian Tour. He has been a runner-up five times on the Asian Tour, in the Shinhan Donghae Open in 2016, the Mercuries Taiwan Masters in 2017 and the Bank BRI Indonesia Open, the TAKE Solutions Masters and the Shinhan Donghae Open in 2018.
